user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: This screenshot displays a product page for a headset on Amazon, offering a 50% discount, bringing the price down to $49.99 from the original price of $99.99. It shows shipping details to the Netherlands, with an estimated delivery time between December 15-30. The options to add the item to the cart or buy it immediately are provided, along with a secure transaction label. Additionally, there is a return policy mentioned and information about shipping from and selling by Amazon.
